mosinstall.name: D4J List Menu v1.0
mosinstall.author: DesignForJoomla.com
mosinstall.description: This module show Joomla! menu in hierarchycal list style.

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: menuclass_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items

param.name: menutype
param.label: Menu Name
param.description: The name of the menu (default is `mainmenu`)

param.name: legacy_mode
param.label: Legacy Mode
param.description: Choosing `Yes` will use Joomla! default `#mainlevel` CSS selector for root <ul> tag, choosing `No` will allow the use of multiple menu instance in same page without the loss of XHTML compliance but require modification on `template_css.css` file to include definition of `.list_menu` CSS selector

param.name: full_active_id
param.label: Full Active highlighting
param.description: Enable full active menu item highlighting, including for `Link - Component Item` and `Link - Url`, which will require modification on `template_css.css` file to include definition of `.active_mitem` CSS selector

param.name: activate_parent
param.label: Activate parent
param.description: Enable active highlighting also for all parent menu items in the hierarchycal list menu

param.name: expand_menu
param.label: Expand Menu
param.description: While this module is developed to always expand all sub-level menu items, you can turn this feature off if you want

param.name: menu_images
param.label: Show Menu Images
param.description: Show the menu images you have selected for your menu items
